price: Guyyaa warra Rabbiin sodaatan gara Rahmaanitti jiila (garee kabajamoo) taasifnee isaan walitti qabnu [yaadadhu].
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَفۡدٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: yawma naḥshuru al-mutaqīna ilā al-raḥmāni wafdan
